replies.msg:

摘要，信中提及作為外交部長應該要：
“Increase Canadian support abroad for democracy, human rights, international law and freedom of the press. In this regard... build on the Magnitsky sanctions regime to ensure increased support for victims of human rights violations by developing a framework to transfer seized assets from those who commit grave human rights abuses to their victims, with appropriate judicial oversight”
